sections.text:
2016 Repeal.

Chapter 41 (§§ 4101 - 4114) was added November 23, 2010, P.L.1269, No.120, and repealed July 20, 2016, P.L.849, No.100, effective immediately. The subject matter is now contained in Article VI-B of the act of April 9, 1929, P.L.177, No.175, known as The Administrative Code of 1929.
